summary: Makes your werebear sound like a bear
descriptionHtml:
I was annoyed that the werebear still used the werewolf sounds so I changed which sounds to play to feel more like a bear and not a wolf.

This small file causes the game to play bear sounds instead of werewolf sounds. Be advised as this will give all werewolves in the game bear sounds.

To install: Simply extract the esp file into the data folder and make sure it\'s checked or download with NMM.

To actually be a werebear, you need another mod to enable that. This mod just changes the sounds.

Clip demonstrating sounds
[youtube]0geyAflwN7k[/youtube]

Ignore the night eye effect, it\'s not part of this mod.
author: Maxtro
